mapper.insert: insert into product ( order_no, product_type_id, name, price, store_qty, creater, create_time, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{productTypeId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{storeQty}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{updater}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: update product set order_no=#{orderNo}, product_type_id=#{productTypeId}, name=#{name}, price=#{price}, store_qty=#{storeQty}, updater=#{updater}, update_time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, order_no, product_type_id, name, price, store_qty, creater, create_time, updater, update_time from product where id = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.product_type_id as "productTypeId", t1.name, t1.price, t1.store_qty as "storeQty", t2.name as "productType", t1.order_no as "orderNo" from product t1 left join product_type t2 on t1.product_type_id=t2.id order by t1.order_no, t1.update_time desc
